from vbrainer.pipeline.abstract_vbrain_step import AbstractVBrainStep
from vbrainer.pipeline.model_objects.ml_model_object import MLModelObject
import logging

from vpipe.utils.dataset_prep_utils import downcast_dataset


logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

what = 'item_id'
where = 'location_id'
when = 'date'


[docs]class WorkingDayTransformer(AbstractVBrainStep):
    """
    Transformation to compute if a day in the datset was a working day or not. Can be subscribed by a working day dataset with the ground truth information bout the days that were working day or not.

    A day is considered not working day in this transformation if a location had zero sales in a given day.

    :dataset_name (str):
        The dataset in which the transformation will be applied (optional - default: "related")
    :ticket_dataset (str):
        The data set that contain the column with the considered sales information (optional - default: "related")
    :ticket_column (str):
        The column to be considered as the sales column (optional - default: "sales")
    :working_day_dataset (str):
        Eventual working day dataset to subscribe the working day column generated (optional - default: "working_day")
    :working_day_column (str):
        Name of the working day column in the eventual working day dataset generated(optional - default: false)
    :default_value (str):
        If the default value is "open", when creating the information for the future will be considered a working day (optional - default: open)
    :forward_looking (bool):
        If we have the information about the fututre working_days (if False than the column will have nan values to dates in the future of the reference date) (optional - default: None)
    :overwrite_past_observations (bool):
        If past observatinos must be overwitten with the eventual dataset Ã¡ssed (optional - default: None)

    .. code-block:: python

        {
            "id": "d10",
            "enabled": true,
            "step_name": "WorkingDay",
            "params": {
                "dataset_name": "working_day"
                "ticket_dataset": "sales",
                "ticket_column": "revenue",
                "working_day_dataset": "working_day",
                "working_day_column": "working_day"
                "default_value": "working_day"
                "forward_looking": true
                "overwrite_past_observatinos": true
            }
        }
    """

    def transform(self, mo:MLModelObject):

        logger.debug('Starting transform WorkingDayTransformer')
        params_ = self.get_exec_params()

        # Fill params =====================================
        ref_date = mo.get_env_var('ref_date')
        forward_looking = params_.get('forward_looking',True)
        ticket_dataset = params_.get('ticket_dataset', 'related')
        ticket_column = params_.get('ticket_column', 'sales')
        workingday_df = params_.get('working_day_dataset', None)
        workingday_column = params_.get('working_day_column','working_day')
        dest_dataset_name = params_.get('dataset_name', 'related')
        default_value = params_.get('default_value', 'open')
        overwrite_past_observations = params_.get('overwrite_past_observations', True)

        ticket_df = mo.get_data(ticket_dataset).copy()

        ticket_df.rename(columns= {ticket_column:workingday_column}, inplace = True)
        ticket_df[when] = ticket_df[when].values.astype('<M8[D]')
        ticket_df = ticket_df[[where, when,workingday_column]].groupby([where, when]).sum().reset_index()

        
        dest_dataset = mo.get_data(dest_dataset_name)
        dest_dataset = dest_dataset.merge(ticket_df.drop_duplicates(subset = [where,when]), how = 'left', on=[where, when] )

        dest_dataset.loc[(dest_dataset[when]<=ref_date) & dest_dataset[workingday_column].isna(), workingday_column]=0
        #inserting default value for future dates
        dest_dataset.loc[(dest_dataset[when]>ref_date) & dest_dataset[workingday_column].isna(), workingday_column]=(1 if default_value=='open' else 0)

        dest_dataset.loc[dest_dataset[workingday_column]>0,workingday_column] = 1
        dest_dataset.loc[dest_dataset[workingday_column]<=0,workingday_column] = 0

        ##overwrite with input info
        if workingday_df is not None:
            workingday_df = mo.get_data(workingday_df)
            if not overwrite_past_observations:
                workingday_df = workingday_df.loc[workingday_df[when]>ref_date]
            dest_dataset = dest_dataset.merge(workingday_df.rename(columns = {workingday_column:'aux'}).drop_duplicates(subset = [where,when]), on= [where, when], how = 'left')
            dest_dataset.loc[~dest_dataset['aux'].isna(), workingday_column] = dest_dataset.loc[~dest_dataset['aux'].isna(), 'aux']
            dest_dataset.drop(columns = 'aux', inplace = True)


        if not forward_looking:
            dest_dataset[dest_dataset[when]>ref_date, workingday_column] = None

        mo.set_data(dest_dataset_name,dest_dataset)

        return mo
